Node.definition: = action by which someone ends a period of inactivity and comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time
= action by which someone ends a period of inactivity and comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time
literally: to clothe oneself; hence: = action by which humans are deities engage themselves in a certain activity
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place
= action by which humans put on clothes or ornaments
= generic designation for any article of clothing
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= process by which an action is repeated or continued
= state in which humans, animals, or objects are regarded by the law as having been contaminated, ► as a result of which they cannot participate in social and religious activities
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface
read שְׁבִי|= a person or group that has been forcibly carried off to prison, into slavery, or resettlement
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= action by which humans detach an object that is tied around them
= material used to tie objects together or to tie animals or humans; ≈ associated with power and control over something or someone else
= part of the body connecting the rump to the head; ► a ;place to wear ornaments, but also a yoke; ≈ a stiff neck is associated with insolence and pride
= a person or group that has been forcibly carried off to prison, into slavery, or exile
singular only: = the population of a certain location, town, or ethnic group, ◄ referred to as the daughter of that location, town, or ethnic group
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which someone performs an event as a favor, without expecting a reward or remuneration for it
= causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

= causative action by which humans cause a person, animal, or inanimate object that has become someone else's property to be restored to its original state, which is normally achieved by paying a price

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range

Node.gloss: to sojourn|to live as alien|to dwell
Node.definition: = state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= state of non existence of a person, place or event
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= action by which someone performs an event as a favor, without expecting a reward or remuneration for it
= action by which humans utter a high pitched cry to give expression to an emotion, which is usually grief or distress, but can also be triumph and glee
literally: all the day; hence: = process by which an event or pattern of events takes place for an extended time, without interruption
literally: name; hence: = the core of one's identity, which reflect the essence of one's being
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
literally: name; hence: = the core of one's identity, which reflect the essence of one's being

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= action by which humans pass on information to someone else, having been commissioned to do so by a deity or another person
= action by which humans pass on information to someone else, having been commissioned to do so by a deity or another person
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= person ► appointed to watch the surroundings of a town or settlement and raise the alarm in case of danger; ≈ regarded as a grave responsibility, for which reason the task of a king or prophet is sometimes compared to that of a watchman
literally: to lift up (one's) voice = action by which humans speak with a loud voice
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event
= state in which a land, building, or town has been totally destroyed, ► to the extent that nobody can live there anymore
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

Node.gloss: to comfort|to console|to reassure|to express sympathy|to bring relief
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities seek to make (other) humans feel relief after a time of grief, anxiety, or fear
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= causative action by which humans or deity deliver an individual or group of people from the power of someone else or from difficult circumstances, ► which usually implies that the one who performed the act of deliverance has the right to claim the ones he delivered for himself
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= causative action by which humans, deities, or animals remove an object that thinly covers another object
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= each of the two upper limbs of the body, including the shoulder and extending until the hand; ≈ directly associated with strength and power
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

Node.gloss: ends of the earth > all people on earth
Node.definition: literally: ends of the earth; hence: = all people on earth, including those living in its remotest corners

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= state in which humans, animals, or objects are regarded by the law as having been contaminated, ► as a result of which they cannot participate in social and religious activities
= process or action by which the hand or another part of the body of humans gets in brief contact with an object, either or not deliberately

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= action by which humans carefully examine themselves in order to determine whether they are ceremonially clean and do whatever is needed to achieve to become clean

Node.gloss: to take up|to lift up|to carry
Node.definition: literally: to lift up; hence: = action by which humans take hold of objects with their hands, with the intention of holding them or bringing them to another location
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans move with urgency, ◄ usually triggered by fear

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to bring up the rear|to form the rear guard
Node.definition: = to march behind a group of travellers to gather the stragglers and keep the group safe from those who might attack from behind
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= state in which humans are able to accomplish whatever they attempt to do

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

literally: to be, become high; hence: = processs by which humans or deities acquire an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified

literally: to be lifted up = state in which humans or deities have an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified

Node.gloss: to be exalted|to be proud|to be haughty|to be arrogant
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities have an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= the part of an object that can be seen with the eye
= the shape of (part of) the body of humans and animals; ≈ mostly used in contexts emphasizing the beauty of someone's face and figure
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
literally: to close part of one's body; hence: = to stop engaging part of one's body ► in order to stop performing a certain action
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to tell|to recount|to proclaim: to declare
Node.definition: = action by which humans communicate verbally to others about an event or situation, with focus on the contents rather than on the speech act

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to look closely|to take note|to pay attention|to consider|to understand|to draw understanding
Node.definition: = action by which someone observes something carefully, with the intention of seeing through the outward appearance of things and grasping their essence, and so gain knowledge and understanding
